A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some really fun scenes\, but so sad to say I was disappointed. It took what could have been epic\, unforgettable moments (Luke training Rey\, discovering who Snoke is\, Discovering Rey's secret background etc.) and made them meaningless and boring and pumped up the needless plot points instead. All while adding anti-star wars humor throughout that just took me out of the movie.
